alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of central Oconee and Clarke Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Beechwood Hills, or near Watkinsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Additional rainfall of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible. Locations impacted include... Watkinsville, Athens, Winterville, Bogart, North High Shoals, Bishop, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Whitehall, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Beechwood Hills, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights, Eastville, Barnett Shoals, Barretts Mill and State Botanical Garden Of Ga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
